segments.text: I'm looking at this everyday kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands by the sink, towel in hand on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is still running.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is flooding over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's creating a puddle right under her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely oblivious to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the side, a boy's on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is open in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His stance looks unsteady, stool tilting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl nearby has her hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sharing a sneaky moment together.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising how much is happening unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR
